mapper.select: SELECT detail.id AS "detailId", device.`name` AS "deviceName", user.realname AS "enginerName", progress.`name` AS "currentProgress", progress.id AS "progressId", report.is_completed AS "isCompleted" FROM ic_work_order_detail detail LEFT JOIN tb_device_number device ON device.id = detail.device_number LEFT JOIN sys_user user ON user.username = detail.service_engineer_name LEFT JOIN ic_work_order workOrder ON workOrder.id = detail.work_order_id LEFT JOIN ic_work_order_progress progress ON progress.id = detail.current_progress LEFT JOIN ic_progress_report report ON report.work_order_detail_id = detail.id WHERE workOrder.id = #{workOrderId}
